itemDescription: English female rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Alice Hunter,  (born 19 September 1985) is an English rugby union player. She has represented England since the 2010 Women's Rugby World Cup and currently captains the team.

response: Notable ex-pupils include Sarah Hunter MBE and Peter Beardsley.
* World Rugby Women's Player of the Year: Sarah Hunter

response: At the 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup three Bristol Ladies players captained their national teams. Sarah Hunter, Carys Phillips and Claire Molloy  captained England, Wales and Ireland respectively.

Lichfield Ladies have had a number of international players play for them. Since 2005, England national women's rugby union team captain, Sarah Hunter has played for Lichfield Ladies. Emily Braund, Victoria Fleetwood, Georgina Gulliver, Natasha Hunt, Justine Lucas, Harriet Millar-Mills, Emily Scarratt and Tamara Taylor all played for Lichfield Ladies and England after being included in the England Women's elite playing squad.
